snippet: Jody Oberfelder Dance Projects performed the installation “4Chambers” at Officers’ House No. 15 on Governors Island.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews performance by Jody Oberfelder Dance Projects at Officers' House No 15 on Governors Island.
lead_paragraph: Jody Oberfelder Dance Projects performed the installation “4Chambers” at Officers’ House No. 15 on Governors Island.

headline.seo: ‘4Chambers’ Offers an Artsy Embrace on Governors Island
headline.main: There Are Pillows and a Lot of Touching, but, Really, It’s a Dance Work
headline.print_headline: There Are Pillows and a Lot of Touching, but, Really, It’s a Dance Work
